mpm_kernels.H
1#ifndef MPM_KERNELS_H_
2#define MPM_KERNELS_H_
3
4#include <AMReX.H>
5#include <AMReX_MultiFab.H>
6#include <constants.H>
7#include <AMReX_PlotFileUtil.H>
8#include <AMReX_MultiFabUtil.H>
9
10AMREX_GPU_DEVICE AMREX_FORCE_INLINE
11int applybc(Real relvel_in[AMREX_SPACEDIM],
12 Real relvel_out[AMREX_SPACEDIM],
13 Real wall_mu, Real normaldir[AMREX_SPACEDIM], int bc)
14{
15
16 //look at section 8
17 //Stomakhin et al., "A material point method for snow simulation",
18 //ACS Trans. Graphics, 32, 4, 102, 2013
19 //Warning!(Sreejith): veln
20 int modify_pos=false;
21 Real velt[AMREX_SPACEDIM],velt_hat[AMREX_SPACEDIM];
22 Real veln=relvel_in[XDIR]*normaldir[XDIR]+relvel_in[YDIR]*normaldir[YDIR]+relvel_in[ZDIR]*normaldir[ZDIR];
23
24 velt[XDIR]=relvel_in[XDIR]-veln*normaldir[XDIR];
25 velt[YDIR]=relvel_in[YDIR]-veln*normaldir[YDIR];
26 velt[ZDIR]=relvel_in[ZDIR]-veln*normaldir[ZDIR];
27
28 Real veltmag=std::sqrt(velt[XDIR]*velt[XDIR]+velt[YDIR]*velt[YDIR]+velt[ZDIR]*velt[ZDIR]);
29
30 velt_hat[XDIR]=velt[XDIR]/(veltmag+TINYVAL);
31 velt_hat[YDIR]=velt[YDIR]/(veltmag+TINYVAL);
32 velt_hat[ZDIR]=velt[ZDIR]/(veltmag+TINYVAL);
33
34 if(bc==BC_NOSLIPWALL)
35 {
36 modify_pos=true;
37 relvel_out[XDIR]=zero;
38 relvel_out[YDIR]=zero;
39 relvel_out[ZDIR]=zero;
40 }
41 else if(bc==BC_SLIPWALL)
42 {
43 //normal is into the domain
44 modify_pos=true;
45 relvel_out[XDIR]=velt[XDIR];
46 relvel_out[YDIR]=velt[YDIR];
47 relvel_out[ZDIR]=velt[ZDIR];
48 }
49 else if(bc==BC_PARTIALSLIPWALL)
50 {
51 if(veln<=zero)
52 {
53 modify_pos=true;
54
55 if(veltmag <= -wall_mu*veln)
56 {
57 relvel_out[XDIR]=zero;
58 relvel_out[YDIR]=zero;
59 relvel_out[ZDIR]=zero;
60 }
61 else
62 {
63 relvel_out[XDIR]=(veltmag+wall_mu*veln)*velt_hat[XDIR];
64 relvel_out[YDIR]=(veltmag+wall_mu*veln)*velt_hat[YDIR];
65 relvel_out[ZDIR]=(veltmag+wall_mu*veln)*velt_hat[ZDIR];
66 }
67 }
68 }
69 else if(bc==BC_PERIODIC) //nothing to do if periodic/outflow
70 {
71
72 }
73 else
74 {
75 amrex::Abort("\nUnknown boundary condition");
76 }
77
78 return(modify_pos);
79}
80
81#endif
